mapper.select: SELECT k.kpi_id, e.emp_no, e.name AS employeeName, d.name AS departmentName, p.name AS positionName, k.goal, k.goal_value, k.kpi_progress, k.progress_25, k.progress_50, k.progress_75, k.progress_100, s.status_type AS statusType, DATE_FORMAT(k.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(k.deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') AS deadline FROM kpi k JOIN employee e ON k.emp_id = e.emp_id LEFT JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.position_id JOIN status s ON k.status_id = s.status_id WHERE k.kpi_id = #{kpiId} AND k.is_deleted = 'N'
